response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This special offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Should you decide to accept this offer, we promise to provide unparalleled support and service throughout your journey with our product. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. We look forward to the opportunity of serving you.", "product_price": 1200000}
